March 7, 1955
ADE BRANCH MEMORANDUM 508.12
Amendment 3

To : ADE Field Activities Stations
From: A. C. Hutchinson, Acting Administrative Officer, ADE, ARS
Subject: Establishment of Funds Available For the Brucellosis and Tuberculosis Programs.

I PURPOSE

This amendment is to revise previously established funds at each individual station to be used in the conduct of the Brucellosis and Tuberculosis Eradication programs.

II GENERAL

The amounts specified herein for each program have been determined for the most part on the basis of revised estimates of costs submitted by each station in accordance with Branch Notice dated February 4, 1955. These funds are to be available for all operating and indemnity costs for both the Brucellosis and Tuberculosis programs. In a few cases, it was necessary to deviate from the estimated totals as submitted. We have tried to keep these adjustments at an absolute minimum.

III FIELD STATION RESPONSIBILITY

It will be the responsibility of each individual station to notify this office immediately in the event that these amounts become insufficient or excessive for station needs.
